ORIGAM Documentation : Data Constant Reference

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified by Zuzana Čapková on Nov 19, 2018

This element allows you to pass a constant value to the service method call's parameter.

Users can set their own values to the constants you define. For that you need to create a Data Constant Menu Item. When a user opens such a menu item they can set a custom value.

Attributes

DataConstantConstant to be passed to the parameter.
